description_open_chat: The main idea of an open chat is to create a communication channel accessible to everyone, which can be linked to a website domain name, a social media profile link, or other keywords. This type of chat is the best solution for communicating with a wide audience.
description_shared_chat: A broadcast chat allows a specific group of people to communicate while the whole world can observe. This type of chat is the best solution for broadcasting messages to a large audience.
description_public_chat: Public chats appear in the general chat search, and any registered user can request to join. A public chat is the best solution for bringing people together based on common interests.
description_private_chat: Private chats do not appear in the general chat search, and only the chat creator can invite a registered user to join. A private chat is the best tool for conversations requiring maximum privacy.
question_2: Who can see the message author?
question_7: Are messages encrypted in the chat?
answer_open_1: Any authorized or unauthorized user can view chat messages.
answer_open_2: Absolutely no one! All messages remain anonymous, and even the author won't know which messages they sent.
answer_open_3: Any authorized or unauthorized user can send a message.
answer_open_4: Absolutely no one! All messages remain unchanged.
answer_open_5: Any authorized or unauthorized user can join the chat.
answer_open_6: No one, open chats are unmanaged.
answer_open_7: Messages are not encrypted. Since anyone can read them, encryption is unnecessary.
answer_private_1: Only an authorized user who is a chat participant.
answer_private_2: Absolutely no one! All messages remain anonymous, and even the author won't know which messages they sent.
answer_private_3: Only an authorized user who is a chat participant.
answer_private_4: Absolutely no one! All messages remain unchanged.
answer_private_5: Any authorized user who has requested to join the chat.
answer_private_7: Each message is encrypted symmetrically. The encryption and decryption key is stored in an encrypted form, and only chat participants can decrypt it using their private key.
answer_shared_1: Only an authorized user who is a chat participant.
answer_shared_2: Absolutely no one! All messages remain anonymous, and even the author won't know which messages they sent.
answer_shared_3: Only an authorized user who is a chat participant.
answer_shared_5: Any authorized user who has requested to join the chat.
answer_shared_7: Messages are not encrypted. Since anyone can read them, encryption is unnecessary.
answer_public_1: Only an authorized user who is a chat participant.
answer_public_2: Absolutely no one! All messages remain anonymous, and even the author won't know which messages they sent.
answer_public_3: Only an authorized user who is a chat participant.
answer_public_5: Only a registered user who has accepted an invitation from the chat administrator.
answer_public_7: Each message is encrypted symmetrically. The encryption and decryption key is stored in an encrypted form, and only chat participants can decrypt it using their private key.
pattern_title_chat: The title can contain letters, spaces, numbers (0-9), and hyphens (-). A hyphen cannot be at the beginning or end.
